content.description: ||The secrets menu is unlocked after getting the **Forbidden scrolls of morbane**||

fields.name: ||Follow the trail after pillaging Pummarola and Skull'O Maniac from the Mad Forest||
fields.value: ||This is the secret for **Boon** Use '!Boon' for more info||

fields.name: ||It is tangible only in the inverted Inlaid Library. Good friends might then show the way.||
fields.value: ||This is the secret for **Avatar Infernas** Use '!Infernas' for more info||

fields.name: ||Deal with the consequences of stealing cheese from the Dairy Plant||
fields.value: ||This is the secret for **Minnah** Use '!Minnah' for more info||

fields.name: ||Investigate the bottom of Gallo Tower||
fields.value: ||This is the secret for **Leda** Use '!Leda' for more info||

fields.name: ||With a pure heart and two good friends, visit the fiery balcony in Cappella Magna||
fields.value: ||This is the secret for **Cosmo** Use '!Cosmo' for more info||

fields.name: ||Be a good boy in Il Molise||
fields.value: ||This is the secret for **Peppino** Use '!Peppino' for more info||

fields.name: ||Run away from Moongolow with all 16 accessories mastered||
fields.value: ||This is the secret for **Trouser** Use '!Trouser' for more info||

fields.name: ||With the most adverse fate in Green Acres, run off the edge of the world.||
fields.value: ||This is the secret for **MissingNo** Use '!MissingNo' for more info||

fields.name: ||Find the only one place where flowers bloom in The Bone Zone||
fields.value: ||This is the secret for **Gains** Use '!Gains' for more info||

fields.name: ||Survive the Boss Rash with just one weapon.||
fields.value: ||This is the secret for **Gyorunton** Use '!Gyorunton' for more info||

fields.name: ||Settle the score with the Reaper||
fields.value: ||This is the secret for **Red Death** Use '!Red Death' for more info||

fields.name: ||1) Cast the spell x-x1vii1||
fields.value: ||This is the secret for **Exdash** Use '!Exdash' for more info||

fields.name: ||2) Uppercut a non-red reaper.||
fields.value: ||This is the secret for **Toastie** Use '!Toastie' for more info||

fields.name: ||3) Sometimes you just need to ask for help||
fields.value: ||This is the secret for **Smith** Use '!Smith' for more info||

fields.name: ||Look under previously owned coffins||
fields.value: ||This is the secret for **Random** Use '!Random' for more info||

fields.name: ||Discover the source of the roaring thunder on the Tiny Bridge.||
fields.value: ||This is the secret for **Scorej-Oni** Use '!Scorej-Oni' for more info||

content.title: Secrets
